plot outline: Bhaskar Pandit is a senior citizen living only with his caretaker Mauli and his dog Tiger. His wife has passed away a few years back and he has a strained relationship with both his children. One day, while going through his journal he realizes that he has been living the exact same routine for many months. With this sudden jolt of realization, he decides to go on a mission to mend the relationship with his children - and he will stop at nothing till he achieves what he wants.
title: Baapjanma
plot: A social drama involving a retired and widowed intelligence officer who is estranged from his married children, who suddenly becomes terminally ill and then sets out to make amends using unconventional methods, with an unexpected ending.

Bhaskar Pandit is a senior citizen living only with his caretaker Mauli and his dog Tiger. His wife has passed away a few years back and he has a strained relationship with both his children. One day, while going through his journal he realizes that he has been living the exact same routine for many months. With this sudden jolt of realization, he decides to go on a mission to mend the relationship with his children - and he will stop at nothing till he achieves what he wants.::Yug

Bhaskar Pandit a former RAW agent had dangerous and adventurous life.But death of his wife and his retirement he just lives a normal life with his caretaker Mauli and Dog Tiger.His children Vikram and Veena have had strained relationship with him.Bhaskar learns about his cancer and wants to unite back with his children before his death.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com

Bhaskar Pandit retired Raw agent who never reveled about his real job to his family he finds that he has very less time as he is suffering from brain cancer.Bhaskar's wife passed away some years back and his children Vikram and Veena have sour relationship with him he is taken care by his servant Mauli and has a companion Dog Tiger.Bhaskar tries to change his life and revel his children about his sickness but finds that one of his friend Gupte committed suicide as his children never turned up to meet him.Bhaskar then with his friend Ashok and Mauli fake his death so that he could be able to see his children before death class.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
